column2: Many children had fallen down the well"," none had come back. Many ambitious young men"," and expendable old men"," had gone down the well"," none had come back. You have gone down the well. In your disoriented stuppor you wonder why no one has ever checked the city plans for the sewer"," and checked why so seep under the town there was

The manhole was shut"," it had been for years. No one in town seems to remember why it was shut"," all that us known is that anyone involved in that operation had died trying to do it. However"," the town council has decided they must know. As you descend into the sewers there is no stench"," or sound"," there is only the whispers of those above"," and down below
